noun.name: toaster
noun.discription: a kitchen appliance used for toasting bread

object1.name: blender
object1.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for blending ingredients

object2.name: microwave
object2.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for heating food quickly

object3.name: coffee maker
object3.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for brewing coffee

object4.name: juicer
object4.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for extracting juice from fruits and vegetables

object5.name: dishwasher
object5.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for cleaning dishes

object6.name: refrigerator
object6.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for preserving food at low temperatures

object7.name: oven
object7.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a kitchen appliance used for baking and roasting food

object8.name: vacuum cleaner
object8.discription: in parallel with 'toaster', is a household appliance used for cleaning floors and carpets
